snippet: Long Island's Conor O'Brien is enjoying a breakout season in which he has his club, Sonderjyske of Denmark, within reach of a Europa League berth.
abstract: Long Island's Conor O'Brien is enjoying a breakout season in which he has his club, Sonderjyske of Denmark, within reach of a Europa League berth.

headline.main: O'Brien Blazing His Own Path in Denmark
